On the hard trodden path of the backpacker, it is becoming increasingly rare to discover the elusive prize that all of us seek: a hidden corner of paradise, untouched and authentic.  While paradise may be a matter of personal preference, who could resist the charm of a rural Caribbean village nestled within impossibly green mountains, and crisscrossed by abundant streams and waterfalls?
